ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'In a short while they will be full of regret.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Answered (the Lord): "They shall wake up repenting soon."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He answered: "A short while, and they shall be repenting."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God replied, "After a very short time they will certainly regret for their deeds."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Allah, “They will soon wake up at morn, regretting.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Allah) said: "In a little while, they are sure to be regretful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: In a little while they will most certainly be repenting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'In a little they will be remorseful.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: In a little while they surely will become repentant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God said, "Before long they will be filled with regret."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah said: after a little while they will become regretful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Said He, ‘In a little while they will become regretful.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Allah) said: "In but a little while, they are sure to be sorry!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah) said: "In a little while, they are sure to be regretful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He replied: 'Before long, by the morning, they shall be remorseful'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Soon they will be filled with regret.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:40] He said, ‘In a little while, of time (‘ammā: the mā is extra), they will become remorseful’, about their disbelief and their denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Allah said: (In a little while they surely will become repentant) they will regret their disbelief when the chastisement seizes them. 377
